snippet: M.L.S. Commissioner Don Garber said the league has been in discussions with New York City officials as they try and identify a suitable site to build a stadium for a 20th league team.
abstract: M.L.S. Commissioner Don Garber said the league has been in discussions with New York City officials as they try and identify a suitable site to build a stadium for a 20th league team.

headline.main: M.L.S. in Midst of Stadium Games in N.Y.C.
